arts.ttl: Liverpool transfer news: Alexander Isak ultimatum issued after twist in Marc Guehi pursuit
arts.sum: Liverpool are running out of time to land Newcastle striker Alexander Isak and Crystal Palace defender Marc Guehi as the summer transfer window nears its conclusion

arts.ttl: Newcastle United - Liverpool: Player Ratings - VAVEL International
arts.sum: Liverpool came out on top with goals from Ryan Gravenberch, Hugo Ekitike and a last minute winner from 16-year-old Rio Ngumoha. Tried to keep a high line and had a good battle with Ekitike, all while linking play from the back but conceding a goal straight after the second half kick off shows a lack of concentration from the back line.

arts.ttl: Newcastle 2-3 Liverpool: Post-Match Liverpool Player Ratings
arts.sum: Makeshift striker Anthony Gordon saw a yellow card upgraded to red by VAR just before half time while Ekitike got the second for Slot’s side at the start of the second 45. After the quick start to the second half, he got his third goal in three games for Liverpool as he drilled his shot into the bottom left corner from just inside the 18-yard box.

arts.ttl: Liverpool's Ngumoha emulates Rooney feat in dramatic win over Newcastle
arts.sum: Liverpool starlet Rio Ngumoha emulates Wayne Rooney with his 100th-minute winner in Monday's 3-2 Premier League victory over Newcastle United.

arts.ttl: 16-year-old supersub scores last-gasp winner for Liverpool to beat 10-man Newcastle
arts.sum: Sixteen-year-old substitute Rio Ngumoha scored a sensational last-gasp winner as Liverpool overcame 10-man Newcastle 3-2 in a Premier League game for the ages on Monday. Second-half injuries to Newcastle’s Sandro Tonali and Fabian Schar prompted at least 11 minutes of added time and, as Newcastle continued to pound Liverpool’s ragged rearguard, it looked like it might grab the most unlikely of winners.

arts.ttl: Eddie Howe makes Alexander Isak admission after Newcastle execs held crunch talks with the striker before the Magpies lost 3-2 to Liverpool - the club he wants to join
arts.sum: Newcastle's owners spoke to Alexander Isak at the striker's home on Monday in an attempt to convince him to stay and return to Eddie Howe's team, who were beaten by a late goal from Liverpool.

arts.ttl: Jamie Carragher goes WILD in Sky Sports studio as Liverpool stun Newcastle with dramatic 100th-minute winner after St James' Park thriller
arts.sum: Jamie Carragher could not contain himself as Liverpool snatched a 100th-minute winner at St James' Park, with footage of his euphoric reaction in the Sky Sports studio going viral.

arts.ttl: Jamie Carragher names Liverpool star who has been 'all over the place' after win at Newcastle - and identifies other player who has had 'really poor start'
arts.sum: Rio Ngumoha etched his name into Liverpool history on Monday night as he came off the bench to score a 100th-minute winner, becoming the club's youngest-ever goalscorer.

arts.ttl: Liverpool fans have a lot to say about Dominik Szoboszlai’s display at right-back against Newcastle United
arts.sum: 'Real Madrid bought the wrong right-back, didn’t they...?'

arts.ttl: Newcastle 2 Liverpool 3 – Instant Newcastle United fan/writer reaction
